title: How to write an application to a principal requesting him to make arrangements for a school library - Quora

response.answer_text: To Principal, Xyz School New Delhi Subject: Reqest for a public library Respected Ma’am/ Sir, I am a student of Class - 6, and on behalf of my entire class I am requesting you to make arrangement for a school library. There are so many voracious readers who want to read but due to non-availability of a good school library we miss out those opportunities. I am here with requesting you to take the initiative and kindly arrange a school library for us. We would be forever grateful to you for this kind inititiave on your part. Thanks Your Name Class Roll No:
